com.xmlmind.util

Class CharSequenceUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.xmlmind.util.CharSequenceUtil

  • public final class CharSequenceUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    A collection of utility functions (static methods) operating on CharSequences. Not documented here because these utilities are supposed to behave exactly like the corresponding methods of class java.lang.String.
    See Also:
    CharSequence
